comment: Unreasonable deadlines for an online class, slow to respond to emails. Wouldn't recommend.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Clark was an excellent teacher to have for the EDUC 2120 class. She has a clear & precise syllabus that was followed throughout the whole semester. Textbook is a requirement in order to reference the reading materials given. Overall, the assignments were easy to complete and it was an easy A! I would definitely recommend taking online!

I managed to swing by this semester without the textbook though it would've been so much easier with it. a module (1-5 assignments) is due each Sunday. a final paper and volunteer hours required. not a hard class, she isn't a hard grader, she's very clear on what she wants, take her.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read

comment: I took this class online and I often didnt do my assignments until the night they were due. I still got an A in the class, but theres a lot of work involved. Buying the textbook is a requirement because you have to use citations. No quizzes or tests. Only discussion posts, journal assignments, and projects. The final exam was a paper.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Tough Grader--Get ready to read

comment: Took as an online summer class. Definitely a lot of work, but it is not bad once you start it. The work is definitely doable. It is an easy A if you do the assignments and participate in the the discussion boards. This was a great course.

Okay, I put that there was a lot of homework, but that is because I actually did all the readings. When I did I was basically guaranteed an A on the assignment. I took this class as part of my summer courses. That means 2 modules a week. She is great with communication. Take the class.

I took EDUC 2120 as an online class and thought I would hate it. I absolutely loved taking this course online! We had one module due every Friday and it made it so easy to work on all my other classes as well! She is a very caring person with the emails she sends out! I would definitely take her again!

TAKE THIS PROFESSOR ONLINE! It was the easiest class I had ever taken and it is an easy A. Just do the discussions, journal reflections, and your field experience. There is no reason you should get anything lower than an A!
